name: py-exceptiongroup

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A backport of the BaseExceptionGroup and ExceptionGroup classes from
Python 3.11.

dependencies.name: py-flit-scm
dependencies.description:
A PEP 518 build backend that uses setuptools_scm to generate a version
file from your version control system, then flit to build the package.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core
dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.

dependent_to.name: py-cattrs
dependent_to.description: An open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.

dependent_to.name: py-anyio
dependent_to.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.
